channel.title: Rstats on Michael Pawlus

item.title: Age of World Cup Players
item.description: Age of World Cup Players This is post two in a series using data for all World Cup teams collected in the first post Here we will do a few visualizations around age. Setup # load libraries library(tidyverse) # for data manipulation library(lubridate) # to work with the birthdates library(knitr) # for tables library(plotly) # for interactive plots # load data all_squads <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/joemgon/worldcup2018/master/squads.csv") How has the age of players changed over time?
